name: Wisin
description: '''Juan Luis Morera Luna''' ({{IPA|es|ˈxwan ˈlwis moˈɾeɾa ˈluna}}; born December 19, 1978), known professionally as '''Wisin''' ({{IPA|es|ˈɣ̝ʷisin}}), is a Puerto Rican rapper, singer and record producer, best known as a member of the reggaeton duo [[Wisin & Yandel]]. Wisin is noted for his unique and aggressive style of rapping.
